title: Can't cast to Chromecast from phone, but can cast from Chrome Web browser.
content:
I want to cast to my Chromecast ultra using my phone. I used to be able to, and still can from Chrome Web Browsers. 

I can cast to my other Chromecast with no issues. 
I have rebooted rooter and unplugged Chromecast and reconnected both at same time. This is a one time cast fix. 
I have factory reset my Chromecast ultra several times. 
When adding my Chromecast ultra, the Google Home app says its been added but can't be found and phone\chromecast ultra aren't on same network (they are and both on same bandwidth).
When in an app to cast, such as Netflix, the Chromecast appears as an option, but the connection always fails. 

Any help? I'm going crazy!
